name: 蕭耀榮
objective: Review of Automatic Control, Linear control, state space, model and dynamic response, controllability, observability, state feedback, state estimation, controller design, observer design, MIMO systems, LQR/LTR, Kalman filter
schedule:
1　　Introduction 
2　　Fundamentals of linear control
3　　Fundamentals of linear control
4　　Fundamentals of linear control
5　　Modeling, linearization and state space representation
6　　Dynamics of linear system
7　　System controllability
8　　System observability
9　　System stability
10　　State feedback
11　　State estimator and observer
12　　 midterm exam / initial project due
13　　state estimator
14　　state observer
15　　Pole assignment
16　　LQR/LTR / Project Discussion
17　　Project presentation
18 LQR/LTR/Kalman filter 

(Weekly topics will be adjusted according to student learning situations.)
scorePolicy:
writing exam: 40%
workshops 20%
project and presentation: 35%
class performance: 5%

(Evaluation items and weightings will be adjusted according to student learning situations)
materials:
text book:
Linear State-Space Control Systems
by R.L. Williams & D.A. Lawrence

reference book:
Control Systems Engineering, 4th Ed.,
by N. Nise, Published by Wiley
